comments.author: kirill.kirillov@yahoo.com
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:7.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0
Build ID: 2011092200

Steps to reproduce:

1. Switched to gtk theme with "wigtk-auto-mnemonics = 1" in gtkrc
2. Opened Firefox 7
3. Looked at menu bar


Actual results:

Menu items had mnemonics by default


Expected results:

Menu items should have mnemonics only if Alt key is pressed as other gtk applications
comments.creator: kirill.kirillov@yahoo.com
